Class DatabaseReader

java.lang.Object
  pizzaProgram.database.databaseUtils.DatabaseReader

public class DatabaseReader
extends Object

A class that performs all read queries to the database

Author:
IT1901 Group 3, Fall 2011

getSettingByKey

public static Setting getSettingByKey(String key)
Retrieves the setting from the database given by the key entered

Parameters:
key - The key representing the desired setting
Returns:
A Setting data object, representing the setting associated with the entered key

getAllSettings

public static ArrayList<Setting> getAllSettings()
Returns a list of all settings in the database

Returns:

getAllActiveDishes

public static ArrayList<Dish> getAllActiveDishes()
Returns a list of all the dishes that are currently on the menu of the restaurant

Returns:
An ArrayList containing Dish instances, each representing an active dish.

getAllDishes

public static ArrayList<Dish> getAllDishes()
Retrieves a list of all dishes from the database, disregarding wether or not they are active

Returns:
An ArrayList containing Dish instances, where every Dish object is a Dish in the Dishes table of the database

getAllActiveExtras

public static ArrayList<Extra> getAllActiveExtras()
Retrieves a list of all extras that are currently on the restaurant's menu.

Returns:
An ArrayList of Extra instances, where every Extra instance is an active Extra.

getAllExtras

public static ArrayList<Extra> getAllExtras()
Retrieves a list of all Extras in the database, disregarding wether or not they are active.

Returns:
An ArrayList containing Extra instances, where each Extra instance represents an Extra in the database

customerHasUncookedOrder

public static int customerHasUncookedOrder(UnaddedOrder order)
Method to check wether or not the customer the provided order is being issued to already has an uncooked order

Returns:
The orderID of the existing order if such an order exists, -1 if not.

getAllUncookedOrders

public static ArrayList<Order> getAllUncookedOrders()
Retrieves a list of all orders that have either been registered or are being cooked from the database

Returns:
An ArrayList containing Order instances, where every Order instance is an order that has been registered, or is being cooked.

getAllDeliveredOrders

public static ArrayList<Order> getAllDeliveredOrders()
Retrieves a list of all orders that have been delivered from the database

Returns:
An ArrayList containing Order instances, where every Order instance is an order that has been delivered.

getOrderSelectionQuery

public static String getOrderSelectionQuery(String whereClause,
                                            String extraOptions)
Generates a query to select orders from the database, with a given where clause, and possible extra parameters.

Parameters:
whereClause - A string representing the where clause of the query. Usage: replace by the where clause in: "WHERE ()".
extraOptions - Any extra options to be placed at the end of the query. These chould be things like "LIMIT 20", or "ORDER BY Orders.OrderID", etc.
Returns:
A String representing a query that can be sent to the database to read and ocnstruct orders

getAllUndeliveredOrders

public static ArrayList<Order> getAllUndeliveredOrders()
Returns a list of all orders that have been cooked, or are being delivered.

Returns:
An ArrayList containing Order instances, where each of the Order instances either has been cooked, or is being delivered.
